General.Name: Kaymus Resources Inc
General.Description: Kaymus Resources Inc. explores, acquires, and develops petroleum and natural gas projects in the Western Canadian Sedimentary Basin. It holds 100% interest in two proposed oil locations located near the town of Sylvan Lake, Alberta. The company was formerly known as Cascadia Resources Inc. and changed its name to Kaymus Resources Inc. in July 2014. Kaymus Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 715 ? 5th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2X6
